Project.Brief history of your project and organi: I'm a DP who has downloaded this dataset. This dataset is from NREL. At the National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL), they focus on creative answers to today's energy challenges. From breakthroughs in fundamental science to new clean technologies to integrated energy systems that power our lives, NREL researchers are transforming the way the nation and the world use energy.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The commercial building sector stock model, or ComStock, is a highly granular, bottom-up model that uses multiple data sources, statistical sampling methods, and advanced building energy simulations to estimate the annual sub-hourly energy consumption of the commercial building stock across the United States.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives, Lotus built-in data transfer
